name: Stash Busting Monster
description: New Pattern for Monster Stash Busting.
sizes_available: Size varies with weight of the yarn
suggested_yarn: Plymouth Yarn Encore Worsted Solids & Heathers
full_text: New Pattern for Monster Stash Busting. I had three partial skeins of leftover yarns and wanted to use it for a monster. This pattern is written in general terms as a recipe to create a monster with your own existing yarns from your leftover stash in any you wish. You will need approximately 200 to 250 yards of stash yarn in at least three colors for the pattern. The size of your monster will vary with yarn weight. The pattern includes embedded links for helpful techniques for knitting in the round with dpns or using magic loop. Other techniques mentioned are 3-needle bind off and jogless stripes. For the sample monster in this pattern, I used worsted weight yarn in three different colors, with a US Size 6 needle.
